trans-unit.source: Defines a base class for controls that support auto-scrolling behavior.
trans-unit.target: Define uma classe base para controles que oferecem suporte para o comportamento de rolagem automática.

trans-unit.source: You do not typically use the ScrollableControl class directly.
trans-unit.target: Você não geralmente usa a classe ScrollableControl diretamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> classes inherit from this class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>classes herdam desta classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl>

trans-unit.source: The ScrollableControl class acts as a base class for controls that require the ability to scroll.
trans-unit.target: A classe do ScrollableControl atua como uma classe base para controles que exigem a capacidade de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: To enable a control to display scroll bars as needed, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMinSize%2A> property to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: Para habilitar um controle para exibir as barras de rolagem conforme o necessário, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade `true` e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMinSize%2A>propriedade para o tamanho desejado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollMinSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the control is sized smaller than the specified minimum size, or a child control is located outside the bounds of the control, the appropriate scroll bars are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando o controle é dimensionado seja menor do que o tamanho mínimo especificado ou um controle filho é localizado fora dos limites do controle, as barras de rolagem apropriados são exibidas.

trans-unit.source: To manually override which scroll bars are visible, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para substituir manualmente as barras de rolagem são visíveis, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If either property is set to `false`, the corresponding scroll bar is not visible, even if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade for definida como `false`, a barra de rolagem correspondente não estiver visível, mesmo se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>está definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event to know when the user or code scrolls the client area.
trans-unit.target: Você pode manipular o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>evento para saber quando o usuário ou código rola a área cliente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>

trans-unit.source: When adding controls programmatically to a form, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A> property to position the control either inside or outside of the current viewable scroll area.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar controles programaticamente a um formulário, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>propriedade para posicionar o controle dentro ou fora da área de rolagem visível atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The default ScrollableControl constructor performs the following actions: - Marks the current instance as a container control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> style to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O construtor de ScrollableControl padrão executa as seguintes ações:-marca a instância atual como um controle de contêiner chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>método para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>de estilo para `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SetStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Enables background erasing by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -Habilita o plano de fundo apagar definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>para `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ControlStyles>

trans-unit.source: - Disables auto-scrolling by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling> bit to `false`.
trans-unit.target: -Desativa a rolagem automática chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>método para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling>bit `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Adjusts the scroll bars on the container based on the current control positions and the control currently selected.
trans-unit.target: Ajusta as barras de rolagem no contêiner com base nas posições de controle atual e o controle selecionado no momento.

trans-unit.source: When required, the AdjustFormScrollbars method lays out the client area, including resizing the display area as required to accommodate the scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: Quando necessário, o método AdjustFormScrollbars apresenta a área do cliente, incluindo o redimensionamento da área de exibição conforme necessário para acomodar as barras de rolagem.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to show the scroll bars; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para mostrar as barras de rolagem; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the container enables the user to scroll to any controls placed outside of its visible boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o contêiner permite que o usuário rolar para os controles colocados fora dos limites visíveis.

trans-unit.source: When `true`, this property enables the container to have a virtual size that is larger than its visible boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Quando `true`, essa propriedade permite que o contêiner ter um tamanho virtual que é maior do que os limites visíveis.

trans-unit.source: There is currently a limitation in Windows Forms that prevents all classes derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> from acting properly when both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> is enabled and AutoScroll is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente, há uma limitação no Windows Forms que impede que todas as classes derivadas de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>funcione corretamente quando ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>está habilitado e rolagem automática está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: For example, let's say that you place a control such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>—or a container class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>)—on your form.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, digamos que você coloque um controle como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>— ou derivado de uma classe de contêiner <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>(como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>) — em seu formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlowLayoutPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: If you set AutoScroll on the container to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> and then set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> property on one or more of the controls inside of the container to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>, then no scrollbar ever appears.
trans-unit.target: Se você definir a rolagem automática no contêiner para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>e, em seguida, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A>propriedade em um ou mais dos controles dentro do contêiner para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles>, em seguida, nenhuma barra de rolagem aparecerá.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AnchorStyles> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>

trans-unit.source: The class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> acts as if AutoScroll were set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.
trans-unit.target: A classe derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>age como se a rolagem automática foi definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: Currently, the only workaround is to nest the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> inside another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente, a única solução alternativa é aninhar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>dentro de outro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: For instance, if you need <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> to work in this situation, you can place it inside of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control and set AutoScroll on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você precisa <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>para trabalhar nessa situação, você pode colocá-lo dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>controle e defina a rolagem automática em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > AutoScroll maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > AutoScroll mantém a visibilidade das barras de rolagem automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property to `true` has no effect when AutoScroll is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>propriedade `true` não tem nenhum efeito quando a rolagem automática está habilitada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the container enables auto-scrolling; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o contêiner habilita a rolagem automática; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the auto-scroll margin.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho da margem de rolagem automática.

trans-unit.source: The auto-scroll margin is the distance between any child controls and the edges of the scrollable parent control.
trans-unit.target: A margem de rolagem automática é a distância entre os controles filho e as bordas do controle pai rolável.

trans-unit.source: The AutoScrollMargin size is added to the size of any child controls contained in the scrollable control to determine whether or not scroll bars are needed.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de AutoScrollMargin é adicionado ao tamanho de quaisquer controles filho contidos no controle rolável para determinar se as barras de rolagem são necessárias.

trans-unit.source: The AutoScrollMargin property is evaluated when the parent scrollable control is resized or the individual child controls are brought into view, and is used to determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AutoScrollMargin é avaliada quando o controle rolável pai for redimensionado ou controles filho individuais sejam colocados em modo de exibição e é usada para determinar se as barras de rolagem devem ser exibidas.

trans-unit.source: Docked controls are excluded from the calculations that determine if scroll bars must be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Controles encaixados são excluídos dos cálculos que determinam se as barras de rolagem devem ser exibidas.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a docked control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, the control fills the parent scrollable control and the docked control is ignored when using the AutoScrollMargin to determine whether scroll bars are needed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se um controle encaixado <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>está definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>, o controle preencherá o controle rolável pai e o controle encaixado é ignorado quando o AutoScrollMargin para determinar se as barras de rolagem são necessárias.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the distance from the edge of a child control to the parent scrollable control is less than the value assigned to the AutoScrollMargin property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the appropriate scroll bar is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Se a distância da borda de um controle filho para o controle rolável pai é menor que o valor atribuído à propriedade AutoScrollMargin e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>está definida como `true`, é exibida na barra de rolagem apropriado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > We recommend, when docking controls within a scrollable control, that you add a child scrollable control, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, to contain any other controls that might require scrolling.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Recomendamos, quando encaixar controles em um controle rolável, adicione um controle rolável filho, como um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>, para conter outros controles que podem exigir a rolagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: You should add the child <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel> control to the scrollable control and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName> and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Você deve adicionar o filho <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>controle para o controle rolável e sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A>propriedade definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName>e sua <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade definida como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DockStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Dock%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Panel>

trans-unit.source: You should set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property of the parent scrollable control to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade do controle pai rolável para `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the height and width of the auto-scroll margin in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que representa a altura e largura da margem de rolagem automática em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> or <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> value assigned is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> ou <> </> *> valor atribuído é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum size of the auto-scroll.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tamanho mínimo de rolagem automática.

trans-unit.source: The AutoScrollMinSize property is used to manage the screen size allocated to the automatic scroll bars.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AutoScrollMinSize é usada para gerenciar o tamanho da tela alocado para as barras de rolagem automática.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that determines the minimum size of the virtual area through which the user can scroll.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que determina o tamanho mínimo da área de virtual por meio do qual o usuário pode rolar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the auto-scroll position.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o local da posição de rolagem automática.

trans-unit.source: The AutoScrollPosition property represents the location of the visible portion of a scrollable control.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade AutoScrollPosition representa o local da parte visível de um controle rolável.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to change the portion of the control that is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Use essa propriedade para alterar a parte do controle que é exibido.

trans-unit.source: When adding controls programmatically to a form, use the AutoScrollPosition property to position the control either inside or outside of the current viewable scroll area.
trans-unit.target: Ao adicionar controles programaticamente a um formulário, use a propriedade AutoScrollPosition para posicionar o controle dentro ou fora da área visível rolagem atual.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> coordinate values retrieved are negative if the control has scrolled away from its starting position (0,0).
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>valores de coordenada recuperados são negativos se o controle foi rolado para fora de sua posição inicial (0,0).</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set this property, you must always assign positive <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values to set the scroll position relative to the starting position.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define essa propriedade, você sempre deve atribuir positivo <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A>valores para definir a posição de rolagem em relação à posição inicial.</xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a horizontal scroll bar and you set x and y to 200, you move the scroll 200 pixels to the right; if you then set x and y to 100, the scroll appears to jump the left by 100 pixels, because you are setting it 100 pixels away from the starting position.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você tiver uma barra de rolagem horizontal e conjunto de x e y para 200, você move a rolagem 200 pixels para a direita; Se você, em seguida, defina x e y como 100, a rolagem aparecerá ir à esquerda, 100 pixels, porque ela está sendo definida 100 pixels fora a posição inicial.

trans-unit.source: In the first case, AutoScrollPosition returns {-200, 0}; in the second case, it returns {-100,0}.
trans-unit.target: No primeiro caso, retorna AutoScrollPosition {0, -200}; no segundo caso, ele retorna {-100,0}.

trans-unit.source: To detect when AutoScrollPosition changes, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, save the old position value in a private variable, and compare the new value to the old value on subsequent <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> events.
trans-unit.target: Para detectar quando AutoScrollPosition é alterado, crie um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>evento, salve o valor antigo da posição em uma variável particular e comparar o novo valor para o valor antigo em subsequentes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that represents the auto-scroll position in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que representa a posição de rolagem automática em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os parâmetros de criação necessária quando a alça de controle é criada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"></xref> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams"> </xref> que contém os parâmetros de criação necessária quando o identificador para o controle é criado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the rectangle that represents the virtual display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o retângulo que representa a área de exibição virtual do controle.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the DisplayRectangle property is the virtual size and position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>está definida como `true`, a propriedade DisplayRectangle é o tamanho virtual e a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the width and height of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> are both 100 pixels and the control contains controls that extend beyond its boundaries, DisplayRectangle represents the size the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> needs to be to include the contained controls.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se a largura e altura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>são ambas as 100 pixels e o controle contém controles que se estendem além dos limites, DisplayRectangle representa o tamanho de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>precisa ser incluir controles contidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A> properties of DisplayRectangle are relevant to the scroll position of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A>Propriedades de DisplayRectangle são relevantes para a posição de rolagem de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.Y%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle.X%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the display area of the control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> que representa a área de exibição do controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the dock padding settings for all edges of the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as configurações de preenchimento de encaixe para todas as bordas do controle.

trans-unit.source: This property controls the border inside of this control for docked components.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade controla a borda dentro deste controle para componentes encaixados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges> that represents the padding for all the edges of a docked control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges>que representa o preenchimento de todas as bordas de um controle encaixado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified flag has been set.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o sinalizador especificado foi definido.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the flags the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> control uses.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir descreve os sinalizadores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>controlar usa.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: |Value|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling>|A mask used to retrieve whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible>|A mask used to retrieve whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible>|A mask used to retrieve whether the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property is set to `true`.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateUserHasScrolled>|A mask used to retrieve whether the user has made the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> scroll.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateFullDrag>|A mask used to retrieve whether the user has enabled the full window drag-and-drop operation.|
trans-unit.target: | Valor | Descrição | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling>| Uma máscara usada para recuperar se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>está definida como `true`. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible>| Uma máscara usada para recuperar se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>está definida como `true`. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible>| Uma máscara usada para recuperar se a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>está definida como `true`. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateUserHasScrolled>| Uma máscara usada para recuperar se o usuário fez a rolagem <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateFullDrag>| Uma máscara usada para recuperar se o usuário tiver habilitado a operação de arrastar e soltar janela inteira. |</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateFullDrag> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateUserHasScrolled> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateAutoScrolling>

trans-unit.source: The flag to check.
trans-unit.target: O sinalizador para verificar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified flag has been set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o sinalizador especificado tiver sido definido; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the characteristics associated with the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as características associadas a barra de rolagem horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties> class contains information about the scroll bar and its operation, such as whether it is enabled and visible, the scroll page size, orientation, display position, and so on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties>classe contém informações sobre a barra de rolagem e sua operação, como se ele está visível e habilitado, o tamanho da página de rolagem, orientação, Exibir posição e assim por diante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties"></xref> that contains information about the horizontal scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HScrollProperties"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a barra de rolagem horizontal.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the horizontal scroll bar is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a barra de rolagem horizontal é visível.

trans-unit.source: The functionality of the HScroll property can also be accomplished through calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible> as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade da propriedade HScroll também pode ser feita por meio de chamadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos usando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible>como o parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateHScrollVisible> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>mantém a visibilidade das barras de rolagem automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the HScroll or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> properties to `true` have no effect when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, definir o HScroll ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>propriedades `true` não tem efeito quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>está habilitado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the horizontal scroll bar is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a barra de rolagem horizontal estiver visível; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Layout"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: If the vertical scroll bar is visible, which means that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the mouse wheel scrolls through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> control vertically.
trans-unit.target: Se a barra de rolagem vertical estiver visível, o que significa que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>está definida como `true`, a roda do mouse para rola o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>controlar verticalmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if only the horizontal scroll bar is visible, which means that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> is set to `false` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> property to set to `true,` the mouse wheel scrolls horizontally.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, se apenas a barra de rolagem horizontal estiver visível, o que significa que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>é definido como `false` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>propriedade definida como `true,` a roda do mouse para rola horizontalmente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnMouseWheel method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnMouseWheel também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.PaddingChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: The OnPaddingChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPaddingChanged também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Paints the background of the control.
trans-unit.target: Pinta o plano de fundo do controle.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnPaintBackground method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnPaintBackground também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [NIB: gerar um evento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnScroll method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnScroll também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>objeto que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Scales a control's location, size, padding and margin.
trans-unit.target: Dimensiona local, tamanho, preenchimento e margem de um controle.

trans-unit.source: The factor by which the height and width of the control will be scaled.
trans-unit.target: O fator pelo qual a altura e largura do controle serão dimensionados.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"></xref> value that specifies the bounds of the control to use when defining its size and position.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.BoundsSpecified"> </xref> valor que especifica os limites do controle a ser usado ao definir seu tamanho e posição.

trans-unit.source: This method is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não é relevante para essa classe.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: O fator de escala horizontal.

trans-unit.source: The vertical scaling factor.
trans-unit.target: O fator de escala vertical.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user or code scrolls through the client area.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário ou o código percorre a área cliente.

trans-unit.source: The Scroll event occurs when the user scrolls through the client area by interacting with the scroll bars, or when the user navigates between controls and the active control scrolls into view.
trans-unit.target: O evento Scroll ocorre quando o usuário rolar a área cliente interagindo com as barras de rolagem, ou quando o usuário navega entre os controles e o controle ativo apareça na exibição.

trans-unit.source: The Scroll event also occurs when you write code, such as setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A> property, that scrolls through the client area.
trans-unit.target: O evento Scroll também ocorre quando você escrever código, como configuração de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>propriedade que percorre a área cliente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScrollPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A> property in your event handler to determine the scroll bar orientation for the Scroll event.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>propriedade no seu manipulador de eventos para determinar a orientação da barra de rolagem para o evento de rolagem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollEventArgs.ScrollOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [NIB: consumindo eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the specified child control into view on an auto-scroll enabled control.
trans-unit.target: Rolar o controle filho especificado em modo de exibição em um controle de rolagem automática habilitada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property must be set to `true`, and at least one of the scroll bars, horizontal or vertical, must also be visible, for the ScrollControlIntoView method to have an effect.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade deve ser definida como `true`, e pelo menos uma das barras de rolagem, horizontal ou vertical, também deve ser visível para o método ScrollControlIntoView ter efeito.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: To make the horizontal and vertical scroll bars visible, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> properties, respectively, must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para tornar as barras de rolagem horizontal e vertical visível, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>Propriedades, respectivamente, devem ser definidas como `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `activeControl` parameter is not a child control, no action takes place.
trans-unit.target: Se o `activeControl` parâmetro não é um controle filho, nenhuma ação ocorre.

trans-unit.source: This method may raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll> event.
trans-unit.target: Esse método pode gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.Scroll>

trans-unit.source: The child control to scroll into view.
trans-unit.target: O controle filho deve aparecer na exibição.

trans-unit.source: Determines the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll*> property.
trans-unit.target: Determina o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll*>

trans-unit.source: The ScrollStateAutoScrolling field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: O campo ScrollStateAutoScrolling é uma máscara.

trans-unit.source: You can use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usá-lo com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos para obter e definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the user has enabled full window drag.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o usuário habilitou arrastar janela por completo.

trans-unit.source: The ScrollStateFullDrag field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: O campo ScrollStateFullDrag é uma máscara.

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set whether the user has enabled full window drag.
trans-unit.target: Usá-la com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos para obter e definir se o usuário habilitou completo arrastar janela.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: When full window drag is enabled, the contents of windows are displayed when the user moves and sizes the windows.
trans-unit.target: Ao arrastar janela por completo está habilitada, o conteúdo do windows é exibido quando o usuário move e dimensiona os windows.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll*>está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll*>

trans-unit.source: The ScrollStateHScrollVisible field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: O campo ScrollStateHScrollVisible é uma máscara.

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use-o com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos para obter e definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the user had scrolled through the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o usuário tinha rolado por meio de <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The ScrollStateUserHasScrolled field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: O campo ScrollStateUserHasScrolled é uma máscara.

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> method to get whether the user had scrolled through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: Usado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>método para obter se o usuário tinha rolado por <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll*>está definida como <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll*>

trans-unit.source: The ScrollStateVScrollVisible field is a mask.
trans-unit.target: O campo ScrollStateVScrollVisible é uma máscara.

trans-unit.source: Use it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods to get and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Use-o com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos para obter e definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.VScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Calculates the scroll offset to the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: Calcula o deslocamento de rolagem para o controle filho especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView%2A> method uses the ScrollToControl method to calculate how far it must scroll to display the specified control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView%2A>método usa o método ScrollToControl para calcular o quanto ele necessário rolar para exibir o controle especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollControlIntoView%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoScrollOffset%2A> property of the child control is used to adjust the scrolled position.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoScrollOffset%2A>propriedade do controle filho é usada para ajustar a posição rolados para.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AutoScrollOffset%2A>

trans-unit.source: ScrollToControl does not cause scrolling; the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation%2A> method is typically used to subsequently scroll to the calculated position.
trans-unit.target: ScrollToControl não causa a rolagem; o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation%2A>método normalmente é usado posteriormente rolar para a posição calculada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetDisplayRectLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The child control to scroll into view.
trans-unit.target: O controle filho deve aparecer na exibição.

trans-unit.source: The upper-left hand <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> of the display area relative to the client area required to scroll the control into view.
trans-unit.target: O lado superior esquerdo <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> da área de exibição relativas à área do cliente necessária para rolar o controle no modo de exibição.

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the auto-scroll margins.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho das margens de rolagem automática.

trans-unit.source: The margin sets the width and height of the border around each control.
trans-unit.target: A margem define a largura e altura da borda ao redor de cada controle.

trans-unit.source: This margin is used to determine when scroll bars are needed on the container and where to scroll to when a control is selected.
trans-unit.target: Essa margem é usada para determinar quando as barras de rolagem são necessários no contêiner e onde rolar quando um controle está selecionado.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a negative number is passed in as the `x` or `y` values, the value will be reset to 0.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se um número negativo for passado como o `x` ou `y` valores, o valor serão redefinidos como 0.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>valor.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*> value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>valor.</xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height*>

trans-unit.source: Positions the display window to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Posiciona a janela de exibição para o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A> property is the virtual size and position displayed client area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>está definida como `true`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A>propriedade é o tamanho virtual e a área de cliente de posição de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.DisplayRectangle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the SetDisplayRectLocation method to scroll through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> to the specified position.
trans-unit.target: Chame o método SetDisplayRectLocation para percorrer o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>na posição especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset at which to position the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento horizontal no qual posicionar o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The vertical offset at which to position the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento vertical onde posicionar a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified scroll state flag.
trans-unit.target: Define o sinalizador de estado de rolagem especificado.

trans-unit.source: When the bit parameter is set to one of the fields of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class, the SetScrollState method updates the state of the control to the `value` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando o parâmetro de bit é definido como um dos campos da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>classe, o método SetScrollState atualizará o estado do controle para o `value` parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the valid parameters and their values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre os parâmetros válidos e seus valores, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: The scroll state flag to set.
trans-unit.target: O sinalizador de estado de rolagem para definir.

trans-unit.source: The value to set the flag.
trans-unit.target: O valor para definir o sinalizador.

trans-unit.source: Gets the characteristics associated with the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as características associadas a barra de rolagem vertical.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties> class contains information about the scroll bar and its operation, such as whether it is enabled and visible, the scroll page size, orientation, display position, and so on.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties>classe contém informações sobre a barra de rolagem e sua operação, como se ele está visível e habilitado, o tamanho da página de rolagem, orientação, Exibir posição e assim por diante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties"></xref> that contains information about the vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.VScrollProperties"> </xref> que contém informações sobre a barra de rolagem vertical.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the vertical scroll bar is visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a barra de rolagem vertical é visível.

trans-unit.source: The functionality of the VScroll property can also be accomplished through calls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> methods using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible> as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade da propriedade VScroll também pode ser feita por meio de chamadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A>métodos usando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible>como o parâmetro.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.ScrollStateVScrollVisible> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.SetScrollState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.GetScrollState%2A>

trans-unit.source: **Note** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> maintains the visibility of the scrollbars automatically.
trans-unit.target: **Observação** <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>mantém a visibilidade das barras de rolagem automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A> or VScroll properties to `true` have no effect when <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>ou propriedades VScroll `true` não tem efeito quando <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A>está habilitado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.AutoScroll%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.HScroll%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the vertical scroll bar is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a barra de rolagem vertical estiver visível; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: O Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ao processo.
